mapper.select: SELECT * FROM work w,learning l,user u where w.learningId = l.id and l.studentId = u.id and l.studentId = #{userId}
select w.* from learning l, work w where l.studentId =#{id} and l.id= w.learningId
select w.* from learning l,work w where l.studentId=#{studentId} and l.id = w.learningId and taskId =#{taskId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO work(learningId, id, state, taskId,viewCount, likeCount, noteCount) VALUES( #{learningId}, #{id}, #{state}, #{taskId},#{viewCount}, #{likeCount}, #{noteCount} )
mapper.select: SELECT n.*,rpu.truename as replyUserName , cteu.truename as createUserName,rpu.role FROM work_comment n , user rpu, user cteu WHERE n.workId =#{workId} AND n.replyUserId = rpu.id AND n.createUserId=cteu.id order by n.createTime desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO work_comment(workId, id, content, createUserId,replayId,replyUserId,createTime) VALUES( #{workId}, #{id}, #{content}, #{createUserId},#{replayId}, #{replyUserId},#{createTime} )
INSERT INTO work_photo(workId, id, viewCount,likeCount,createTime,image) VALUES( #{workId}, #{id}, #{viewCount},#{likeCount},#{createTime},#{image} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM work_paper WHERE workId= #{workPaperId} order by points desc limit 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO work_paper(workId, id, points, duration,startTime,endTime) VALUES( #{workId}, #{id}, #{points}, #{duration},#{startTime}, #{endTime} )
INSERT INTO work_paper_answer(questionId, answer, paperId, comment) VALUES( #{questionId}, #{answer}, #{paperId}, #{comment} )
mapper.select: select sum(points) as points from task_question where id in(select op.questionId from work_paper_answer an,task_question_option op where an.answer = op.id and correct =1 and an.paperId=#{paperId})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO praise (noteId, workId, userId) VALUES (#{noteId}, #{workId}, #{userId})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM praise WHERE workId = #{workId} AND userId=#{userId}
mapper.select: Select * from praise where workId=#{workId} and userId=#{userId}
